attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a voluntary group who wish to re open the existing goods rail link between Shefield and Stocksbridge to operate a passenger service. We will operate this as a Heritage Railway creating full time, part time and voluntary posts. This is a project that ticks all the boxes. Please support us.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
